queries.author: Dividad Van Tomlinpot
queries.query: Have you or have you ever known someone whose fallen victim to diphtheria on the oregon trail?

queries.author: Sharmy Proverbencaux
queries.query: Might someone offer the means by which I might saveth this poor scorch-ed casserole?
queries.notes: If there exists a way in which my pastas might not be squanderethed, I'd be ever-so gratefuleth!
